page.title: 01Summary of the Area (p.1)
page.content: Our area consists of three hamlets - Westby, Ballam and Moss Side; and one village - Wrea Green. Most of our area covers the countryside, and there are many farms and fields which have ponds in them. A railway track, joining Kirkham with Blackpool runs straight through the block. It crosses a level crossing at Moss Side. Near here there is a hospital which looks after patients who are convalescing. There is also a caravan site. Although there are a few council houses by the level crossing you would also see some bungalows and detached houses. The houses at Westby and Ballam are similar. In our block the views across the flat fields from the country lanes are beautiful. In Wrea Green there are five shops.
